title: Happy Veggie Garden
description: Chinese vegetarian restaurant. Extensive menu selections of vege meats, tofu, and vegetable dishes. Most items are vegan, saucy, and full of flavor. Cheap lunch specials offered during the week; weekend prices are more. Complimentary hot tea. Has brown rice. Nice atmosphere though very busy at meal times. Accept credit cards when over $20. Can accommodate small or large parties.
